meanings.definition: The activities performed by living organisms.
meanings.sent1: The zookeeper observed the bioactivities of the animals in the exhibit.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the bioactivities of plants to understand their growth processes.
meanings.sent3: The bioactivities of the ants in the garden provided entertainment for the curious child.
meanings.sent4: The bioactivities of the forest at night create a symphony of sounds.
meanings.sent5: The bioactivities of the bacteria under the microscope were fascinating to the students.

meanings.definition: The biological activities of a substance.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are investigating the bioactivities of the new drug in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The bioactivities of the enzyme were crucial for the chemical reaction to occur.
meanings.sent3: The bioactivities of the medicine seemed to have a dance of their own in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The bioactivities of the plant extract were like a powerful force in promoting healing.
meanings.sent5: The bioactivities of the virus were a mystery that scientists were trying to unravel.
